results.title: 3 good reasons
results.brief_description: David Hunt is a volunteer for the Heart Foundation. He speaks of his own personal tragedies and how these particular events have motivated him to dedicate his time to the Heart Foundation. Made as part of ‘The Heart of the Story’ in association with Vic Health and the Heart Foundation.

results.title: The Heart Foundation
results.brief_description: After losing his father to a heart attack when he was young, Andrew Tonkin dedicated his life to researching heart disease. This is his story of his own experiences with the Heart Foundation. Made as part of ‘The Heart of the Story’ in association with Vic Health and the Heart Foundation.

results.title: New beginnings
results.creator_credit: Stella Paraskakis and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Migrating to a new country as a young girl can be an overwhelming experience. This story captures the memories of life in a new country by a young girl who migrated to Australia from Greece with her family.
results.description: Migrating to a new country as a young girl can be an overwhelming experience. This story captures the memories of life in a new country by a young girl who migrated to Australia from Greece with her family.

results.title: The Irrepressible Jack Stone
results.brief_description: A heartbreaking but inspiring story about Jack Stone, the kid who lived every moment of his life to the fullest - as told by his mother. Created as part of ‘The Heart of the Story’, an ACMI Digital Storytelling Project in association with the National Heart Foundation of Australia (Victorian Division) in partnership with VicHealth. You can create your won Digital Story. Ask at the Information Desk or go to www.acmi.net.au/digitalstorytelling

results.title: The Day Before I Went Away
results.creator_credit: Guo Jian, ACMI and SBS Independent
results.brief_description: Guo Jian’s saucy and sinister reappropriation of Chinese propaganda painting techniques is heightened by this animation of his allegorical work ‘The Day Before I Went Away’.

results.title: Gel
results.creator_credit: Ralph Henderson, Eric White and Films Sagittaire
results.brief_description: Produced for the Davis Gelatine company, the film uses a domestic science student to outline some of the properties and uses of gelatine. Various examples of modern gelatine cookery are also shown.

results.title: Extending boundaries
results.brief_description:
A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop “Against the Grain” in association with Partners in Grain (PING).
Merna Curnow, raised on a farm, always wanted to be a teacher. She never considered herself as a farmer, not even when she married a third generation farmer of the Curnow family. Teacher, mother and supportive wife until one day she suffered an identity crisis when helping her husband out on the farm. That day became a turning point in Merna’s life.

results.title: Happy birthday
results.brief_description: Touching dedication to a mother by her eldest child, her only son. Scott talks of his close relationship with his mum, of their journey together through dark times, of change and survival and finally a second chance at life, love and family.
